content: than your desired foot length from back of your heel to end of your big toe toe decrease round 1 n1 k1 ssk k to end n2 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 n3 k1 ssk k to end n4 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 round 2 k across all stitches n1-n4 repeats rounds 1 and 2 above until only 7 8 9 stitches remain on each needle total 28 32 36 stitches distribute evenly on 2 needles with your tapestry needle close the toe using the kitchener stitch or 3 needle bind off technique weave in ends soak and block if desired yay you re done now you re ready to go ahead with sock two 4 © the kitchen sink shop abbreviations k knit p purl n - needle ssk slip 1 stitch knit wise onto right needle slip another stitch knit wise onto right needle then knit the two stitches together k2tog knit 2 stitches together as one stitch p2tog purl 2 stitches together as one stitch s1 knitwise - slip one stitch knit wise with yarn held in back s1 purl wise - slip one stitch purl wise with yarn held in front rs right side of work ws wrong side of work questions email me at thekitchensinkshop@gmail com i d love to see your opa s sokken tag me @thekitchensinkshop #opassokken 5 © the kitchen sink shop
